description:
“Every time I look at you… I feel like I’m changing.”

He was the first in everything for Layla.

The first time he saw Layla, he didn’t frown.

He was the first one to extend his hand to Layla, the first one to let Layla know what tenderness is.

“Come with me. I will save you from this damn ditch.”

That’s why she couldn’t help but love him.

Even after knowing that it was false tenderness.

Even after knowing that all he wanted was her body.

“Bioust, the savior of my life. I really… like you.”

Even after realizing that she was destined to die soon.>
